problem.markdown:
1. For animation of a push button/ switch in operator interface platform in DCS --- command is used () Switch () Change (x) Toggle () Operate
2) Faceplate are used for ---- () Controllers () Digital I/Os () Analog I/Os (x) All these
3) To indicate continuous tank level change on operator’s screen, the tag value must be set as () Exact value (x) Range () Exact value and Range () Exact value/ Range
4) Normally highest priority alarms are indicated with ---- colour in SCADA (x) Red () Yellow () Green () user selectable
5) For Secondary alarms in DCS system -------- colour is preferred () Red (x) Yellow () Green () User selectable
problem.p: 1. For animation of a push button/ switch in operator interface platform in DCS --- command is used
3) To indicate continuous tank level change on operator’s screen, the tag value must be set as
4) Normally highest priority alarms are indicated with ---- colour in SCADA
5) For Secondary alarms in DCS system -------- colour is preferred
